content.text:
# Raja Lakshmeshwar Singh

Raja Lakshmeshwar Singh was a Janata Dal politician and a former member of the Uttar Pradesh Legislative Assembly from Basti District, Uttar Pradesh.
References
*Basti ka Rajgharana [https://www.pravakta.com/basti-ka-rajgharana/]
*RLD Leader Raja Aishwarya Raj Singh [https://www.patrika.com/gorakhpur-news/family-politics-system-in-gorakhpur-1495426/]
